data.title: Karina Fin Meindl on LinkedIn: #talentconnect2019 #plusonepledge #lyft #linkedin #bettertogether…
data.meta_description: Happy Friday y’all from Dallas! One immediate takeaway from #TalentConnect2019 is I invite everyone to participate in the #plusonepledge. “If we reach outside…
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

Happy Friday y’all from Dallas! One immediate takeaway from #TalentConnect2019 is I invite everyone to participate in the #plusonepledge. “If we reach outside of our networks, we can level the playing field and help close the network gap.” Today, I connected with my #Lyft driver Klejdi who moved to US from Albania 1 year ago trying to get a job in sales without a network and unfamiliar with #LinkedIN. I told him about the #BetterTogether vision, exchanged emails to link him to a #CapitalOne retail bank recruiter and gave him 1 year LI Premium subscription thanks to #JeffWeiner. Look forward to be his first connection! We can help make an impact, one person at a time. What is your story? #LifeAtCapitalOne
